insights.sleepOnTrackMsg: Babies aged {ageRange} months typically sleep {min}-{max} hours. An average of {avg}h is right on track. Every baby is different.
insights.sleepLowMsg: Average sleep is {avg}h over the last week. Most babies aged {ageRange} months sleep {min}-{max}h. Every baby is different.
insights.feedingStretchingMsg: Feeding intervals are stretching from {oldInterval}h to {newInterval}h. This is common as babies grow. Every baby is different.
insights.growthTrackingMsg: Tracking at the {percentile}th percentile for weight. Every baby is different.
insights.diaperHealthyMsg: {count} diapers per day is a healthy sign of good feeding. Every baby is different.
insights.feedingNormalMsg: Averaging {avg} feeds per day, within the typical range of {min}-{max} for this age. Every baby is different.

hero.headline: Track tiny moments.
hero.subheadline: A baby tracker that works when you can barely keep your eyes open. One hand. One tap. Done.
hero.disclaimer: Free to use. No credit card required.

problem.title: It's 3am. You don't have six taps.
problem.line1: The feeding happened. The diaper changed. Nap time shifted. You know one of these is important by morning.
problem.line2: Your baby tracker should help you capture moments fast, not force another round of decision fatigue at midnight.
problem.line3: henrii keeps baby tracking simple, quick, and one-handed.

features.title: Everything your baby needs. Nothing you don't.
features.subtitle: Track feedings, sleep, diapers, and more. All designed for one-handed use at 3am.

feeding.title: Feedings
feeding.description: Breast, bottle, or solids. When, how much, how long.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.description: Start a live timer, or log after the fact when you forgot to hit start.

diaper.title: Diapers
diaper.description: Type, color, consistency. Yes, you will care about poop color.

vaccination.title: Vaccinations
vaccination.description: Pre-loaded schedules for the US, UK, and Vietnam. Knows what's due based on birthday.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Weight, length, head circumference plotted against WHO percentile curves.

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.description: Rolling over, first words, crawling. Based on WHO and CDC data.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: With file attachments and reminder emails so you stop missing them.

name.title: Why the name "henrii"?
name.line1: The app is named after my son, Henry.
name.line2: The double i in the name is our logo idea: parent and baby side by side.
name.line3: Built for parents who need support, not more complexity.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.description: Create your free account in 30 seconds.

profile.title: Add your baby
profile.description: Enter their birthday and country. Vaccinations auto-populate.

track.title: Start tracking
track.description: Tap the + button. Pick the event. Done.

pricing.title: Free vs Premium
pricing.subtitle: Core tracking is free forever. The stuff that matters most costs nothing.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For parents who want the full picture.

whatIs.question: What is henrii?
whatIs.answer: henrii is a baby tracking app built by a sleep-deprived dad who got tired of the alternatives. It tracks feedings, sleep, diapers, vaccinations, growth, and milestones — designed so every action takes under 3 seconds, one-handed.

isFree.question: Is it really free?
isFree.answer: Core tracking (feedings, sleep, diapers, vaccinations, milestones) is free forever. Premium features like WHO growth charts, analytics dashboards, and PDF export will be available with a paid plan.

appStore.question: Do I need to download it from the app store?
appStore.answer: No. henrii is a Progressive Web App. Install it on your home screen from any browser — no app store required. Works on iPhones, Androids, tablets, and desktops.

offline.question: Does it work offline?
offline.answer: Yes. Log events without wifi. Everything saves locally and syncs when you're back online. Babies don't care about your signal strength.

sharing.question: Can my partner or family use it too?
sharing.answer: With a Premium plan, you can invite up to 5 caregivers — grandparents, your partner, or a nanny. Everyone sees the same data. No more "did you feed her?" texts.

dataSafe.question: Is my baby's data safe?
dataSafe.answer: Your data is encrypted, access is controlled at the database level, and your baby's information never leaves your account unless you invite someone. We don't sell data, don't run ads, and don't track your behavior.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: English and Vietnamese at launch. More languages are coming.

different.question: How is henrii different from other baby trackers?
different.answer: Most trackers look like medical devices or take six taps to log a bottle. henrii is built for exhausted parents: one-handed logging in under 3 seconds, scheduled dark mode for night feeds, offline support, and analytics that show patterns without judgment.

cta.headline: Built for 3am.
cta.subheadline: Get started with your free account and start tracking the details that matter.

legal.deleteBody: Deletion revokes account access immediately, soft-deletes data, and hard-deletes after 30 days.

invite.title: Caregiver invitation
invite.loginRequired: Sign in with the invited email to accept this caregiver invitation.
invite.expired: This invitation has expired or was revoked.
invite.invalidBody: This invitation link is not valid.

conflicts.body: Potential duplicate events are retained and flagged for review.
